dbhub.description: Access to Oregon Trail rental listing cache database

databaseInfo.name: cache.db
databaseInfo.purpose: Rental listing cache and field protection system

tables.web_pages: Primary web page content cache (actively used)
tables.field_hashes: Field-level hash tracking for manual edit protection (actively used)
tables.page_cache: Legacy web page cache with URL hashing (not currently used)

web_pages: url (TEXT PRIMARY KEY) - Rental listing URL
content (TEXT) - Cached HTML/content from the page
cached_at (TIMESTAMP) - When the page was cached
field_hashes: field_name (TEXT) - Field name (url, address, price, beds, baths, sqft, house_type, description, amenities, available_date, parking, utilities, contact_info, appointment_url, scraped_at, notes, decision)
field_hash (TEXT) - MD5 hash of field value (8 chars)
last_updated (TIMESTAMP) - When hash was last updated
page_cache: url_hash (TEXT PRIMARY KEY) - Unique hash identifier
url (TEXT NOT NULL) - Original rental listing URL

usagePatterns.field_protection: Tracks manual edits to prevent data loss during rescraping
usagePatterns.web_caching: Stores scraped rental listing content to avoid re-scraping
usagePatterns.hash_management: Uses MD5 hashes to detect field changes and preserve manual edits

cliCommands: notes-status - Show which listings have notes
reset-hashes - Reset field hashes for a listing
